title: Pilot: The Best Years
description: Nancy walks in on Jeff and finds him with another woman and moves back home. Buddy overhears something Kate says about her children, and runs away.

title: Monday Is Forever
description: The family is stressed out and Kate is nervous as she must continue to wait for news from the doctor on Monday, whether or not she has cancer. Buddy may lose her friend Laura, whose family may have to move to Detroit.

title: A Special Kind of Loving
description: Willie meets Salina McGee and falls in love, leading to Buddy's jealousy, who needs him to help her overcome her fear of diving.

title: A Right and Proper Goodbye
description: Hattie, Kate's headstrong mother, pays a final visit to the family. She attempts to hide a serious illness, but takes Buddy into her confidence. Kate eventually realizes that Hattie can no longer live independently and considers moving her in with the Lawrence family, though Doug and Buddy are resistant to the idea for very different reasons. Ultimately, Hattie returns to her Oregon farm, accompanied by Willie. Weeks later, Willie phones with the news that Hattie has died peacefully.

title: Thursday's Child
description: The family relives painful memories of Timmy Sr.'s death as Timmy Jr.'s christening approaches.

title: Point of Departure
description: During a string of burglaries that sweeps through the neighborhood and tests the family, Doug resents Willie's attitude towards life and work.

title: Coming Apart
description: When Buddy gets a part-time job at a bakery, Willie is smitten with the owner, Big Al. Meanwhile, Nancy finds herself in a romantic triangle between Peter, her former college professor, and ex-husband Jeff, anxious for a reconciliation.

title: Such Sweet Sorrow
description: Willie's relationship with Big Al is complicated by Salina's surprise reappearance in his life. Doug considers relocating the family to New York.

title: Home Movie
description: Willie annoys the family when he decides to film their lives for a documentary. In a school assignment, Buddy ponders how she'll leave her mark on the world.

title: Coming of Age
description: Buddy begins puberty. Nancy finds herself torn between Peter's proposal and her attraction to a stranger.

title: Jury Duty: Part 1
description: Kate confronts fear and prejudice when she's selected for jury duty in the trial of a young Latino man accused of the rape and murder of a girl the same age as Buddy. Buddy tries to win T.J. Latimer and a skateboarding competition.

title: Jury Duty: Part 2
description: After Rudy Cortes is freed, Kate doubts her decision when another young girl is murdered. Buddy is stalked by the killer.

title: The Cradle Will Fall
description: The family is drawn into a custody battle between Salina and her daughter's married father. Kate accidentally discovers that Elaine's husband Fred is being unfaithful.

title: Skeleton in the Closet
description: Doug must face his sister Emily's alcoholism. Buddy tries to help a senior citizen she spots shoplifting food from the supermarket.

title: On the First Day of Christmas
description: Doug and his father are at odds when James introduces the family to his younger fianc√©e Constance, a woman with a lurid past. Jeff angers Nancy by insisting that Timmy accompany him on a Christmas cruise.

title: Rites of Friendship
description: Willie experiences difficulty accepting his childhood friend Zeke who is arrested in a gay bar. Buddy seeks dancing lessons from a disinterested Nancy.

title: An Eye to the Future
description: Kate ponders going to college, Doug has a shot at the bench, and Buddy becomes part of the CB radio craze.

title: Lovers and Strangers
description: Willie begins an affair with older film director Elizabeth Kraft. Buddy gifts Doug with a dog for his birthday.

title: Return Engagement
description: Maggie Calder, the woman who nearly destroyed Doug and Kate's marriage 20 years ago, is back for a second attempt. Buddy feels she's being treated like a baby.

title: Mirror, Mirror on the Wall...
description: Kate intercedes for Elaine and the young woman she gave up for adoption before marrying Fred. Willie wonders about the private life of a beautiful client at the photo studio.

title: Someone's Watching
description: Buddy's schoolmate views the Lawrences as his surrogate family. Anonymous gifts from a secret admirer begin to frighten Nancy.

title: A Safe House
description: Willie's old friend Sam Trask, wanted by the FBI, seeks Willie's help in visiting his dying father. Buddy learns about responsible journalism when she publishes a story for the school newspaper without verifying the facts.

title: Best Friends
description: Buddy's relationship with T.J. complicates her friendship with Audrey. At her class reunion, Nancy becomes reacquainted with Brian Slater, the high school sweetheart she dumped for Jeff, but Brian's hiding a terrible secret.

title: Taking Chances: Part 1
description: After a hit-and-run accident, Doug must decide between a life of total blindness or risky surgery that could completely restore his vision or possibly kill him.

title: Taking Chances: Part 2
description: A fearful Doug attempts to adjust to life as a blind man, while the family is divided about the surgery that may restore his sight.

title: Coming and Goings
description: Willie and Salina search for an apartment together. Jeff's mother Sylvia is confined to the Lawrence home following a back injury and a quarrel with Jeff's father.

title: ...More Things in Heaven and Earth
description: A chance meeting with psychic Calvin Manners becomes an obsession with Kate when he assures her that he can solve the mystery of her favorite aunt, missing since World War II.

title: An Endangered Species
description: Kate spends time with a divorced friend, while Nancy's classmate wants to use the Lawrence guest house for trysts with a married man.

title: Acts of Love: Part 1
description: Willie discovers that his new girlfriend Lizzy is terminally ill. Nancy and Buddy plan a very belated 25th anniversary party for Doug and Kate.

title: Acts of Love: Part 2
description: As Lizzy's condition deteriorates, Willie proposes marriage.

title: The First Time
description: Kate experiences the blues as she approaches her last birthday before the golden years. Buddy must decide whether or not to accept T.J.'s offer to go steady.

title: Change of Heart
description: When Jeff introduces her to his new fianc√©e, Nancy realizes she still harbors deep feelings for him. T.J.'s interest in another girl sparks Buddy's jealousy.

title: Annie Laurie
description: While working on an important patent case, Doug meets formidable attorney Annie Laurie, who is interested in more than his briefs.

title: We Love You, Miss Jessup
description: Buddy is fawning over her teacher Miss Jessup. When Kate goes to a PTA meeting one of the parents reveals that Miss Jessup is a lesbian and that she reportedly had an affair with a student. So the parent wants to mount a campaign to have her removed. When she asks who among the parents agree and disagree with her. Kate chooses not to take sides at the moment till she can look into it more closely.

title: The Little Brother
description: Willie invites Emmett, a homeless youth, to stay with the family, envisioning an easier life for him. However, Emmett views the situation much differently. Meanwhile, Buddy researches the more colorful members of her family history while creating a family tree for school.

title: Childhood's End
description: Buddy's old friend Laura Richardson returns for a visit, and Buddy discovers Laura is a teenage alcoholic.

title: A Tale Out of Season
description: Doug learns his favorite prot√©g√© Carl Schuyler has a history of domestic violence. Nancy befriends a puppy.

title: Labors of Love
description: Feeling neglected by T.J., Buddy attempts to make him jealous by exploiting the feelings of another classmate. Willie suspects his new job at an ad agency was earned because the boss finds him attractive.

title: A Child Is Given
description: The Lawrences need a Christmas miracle when Timmy develops a life-threatening illness, and Willie is unable to cope with the threat of another loss after Lizzy's death.

title: More Than Friends
description: Nancy's relationship with Michael Kagan, Willie's writing teacher, is threatened when Kagan vilifies Willie's script.

title: Princess in the Tower
description: Trapped overnight in a high-rise condo with a young pregnant woman, Kate is forced to help when the stranger goes into labor.

title: Echoes of Love
description: Unable to move past Lizzy's death, Willie seeks a relationship with her former roommate Ellen. Audrey is angry over her parents' impending divorce and Doug's decision to represent them.

title: See Saw
description: Kate mentors an angry young man at the Braille institute. Buddy prepares for a skiing trip with T.J. and his family.

title: Lifeline
description: Nancy's friend from law school attempts suicide, and Nancy must find a way to keep her alive until help arrives.

title: And Baby Makes Three
description: After Nancy learns she's pregnant with Jeff's baby, the two consider remarriage, but Nancy isn't sure things will be any different the second time around.

title: Crossing Over
description: A bad interview with a movie producer, drinks with Doug, and an amiable stripper are the highlights of Willie's 21st birthday.

title: The Covenant
description: Medical crises abound in the family when James reveals to Doug that he must soon undergo exploratory surgery, and Nancy begins to miscarry Jeff's baby.

title: A Friend of the Family's
description: Seth Oliver, a former friend of Willie, pays a visit and manipulates the family. Doug and Kate debate taking separate vacations.

title: Fear of Shadows
description: A recurring nightmare of running over a small boy with her car haunts Kate. Meanwhile, Buddy takes in a pet raccoon.

title: Sleeping Gypsy
description: Buddy's friend Mara, the daughter of Kate's old friends, makes Buddy's life difficult at school with her unconventional personality.

title: Counterpoint
description: Kate clashes with her elitist music professor who dismisses her as a bored housewife. Doug faces his own mortality when a colleague collapses from a sudden heart attack.

title: Starting Over
description: The Lawrences adjust to an addition to the family when eleven year old Annie Cooper comes to live with them following the death of her parents, friends of Doug and Kate.

title: All for Love
description: Buddy's boyfriend Zack pressures her to have sex, and she contemplates sleeping with him to keep him from turning to a pretty rival. Doug considers buying a sports car.

title: Changes
description: Nancy and Jeff move closer to remarriage. Annie's decision to take the Lawrence surname disturbs Buddy.

title: Magic
description: In the hospital for a physical, Kate befriends weary rock star Caddy Wilde, who's recovering from a drug overdose. Annie seeks Doug's acumen as a magician to help her learn tricks for school.

title: Just Friends
description: Nancy decides to find an apartment of her own, but Doug finds it difficult to let her go. Willie becomes attracted to a married woman in his writing class.

title: Generations
description: The family decides to spend Thanksgiving at Hattie's farm where Kate faces ghosts from the past. Buddy is intrigued by a local boy.

title: Expectations
description: Nancy's the victim of sexual harassment from her new boss. Buddy tries out for a slot on the cheer leading squad at school.

title: Gifts
description: Disturbed by all the holiday cheer, a lonely and bereft Annie decides to run away.

title: The Friend's Affair
description: Doug and Kate draw battle lines when Doug lies for a friend who's having an extramarital affair. Annie spies on a neighbor and believes he might have murdered his wife, as in the film Rear Window.

title: Exits and Entrances
description: Kate's friend, a professional actress, pushes Buddy to replace an ing√©nue in her play. Annie accepts a part-time job selling disco lessons to fund a new bike she wants to buy.

title: Moment of Truth
description: Audrey and Buddy are accused of cheating on an algebra test. The family is threatened by Bob Gantry, a criminal Doug sent to prison years ago.

title: Malicious Mischief
description: Joe Alcott, Nancy's latest love interest, is accused of child abuse at his daycare center. A pet cat complicates Willie's life.

title: Sleeping Over
description: Buddy's invitation to a sorority becomes a sore point in her friendship with Audrey when Audrey isn't invited to join. Willie sleeps with Kate's musician friend, leading to a serious mother-son rift over casual sex.

title: Disco Queen
description: Buddy develops a secret social life by sneaking into a disco. Annie dates an attractive but boring football player.

title: The Athlete
description: Volunteering at the hospital, Buddy befriends a high school basketball player recuperating from a broken leg, unaware that he is being biopsied for cancer. Annie and rival Emmy Sheldon vie for class president.

title: The Competition
description: Buddy learns the price of competition when an overachieving classmate commits suicide after losing a history competition to her. Annie's cookie-selling strategy is a riot.

title: Ballerina
description: After she steals his parking space and hits his car, Willie insists on having coffee and more with an attractive ballerina. Doug buys a Flex-O-Ciser, a mail order home gym.

title: Diversions
description: While studying for the bar exam, Nancy's attention is diverted by a charming and seemingly accident-prone neighbor.

title: An Apple for the Teacher
description: Just as she begins teaching, Kate's challenged by trouble-making student Phillip Ogden. Annie loses Buddy's lucky ring.

title: Prelude
description: Buddy's crush on her swimming coach leads to problems with Zack. Kate considers contacting a former flame.

title: Going Straight
description: Willie hires Bambi Deering, the stripper he met on his 21st birthday. Doug attempts to save hefty plumber's fees by repairing the household pipes himself.

title: From Russia with Love
description: Kate enraptures a visiting Russian composer. Buddy and Annie vie for Willie's old bedroom.

title: Thanksgiving
description: After James nearly starts a deadly fire, Doug must face his father's senility. Buddy encourages James to live with the family instead of going to a nursing home.

title: 'Tis the Season
description: Doug's quarrel with Willie almost leads to a heart attack. Buddy brings home school janitor Mr. Duffy for the holiday, much to Kate's chagrin.

title: Jack of Hearts
description: Just as Nancy and Buddy finally affect a closer sister relationship, Buddy develops a crush on her jogging partner Jack and later discovers that he and Nancy have been intimate.

title: When the Bough Breaks
description: Kate's unplanned pregnancy is a source of conflict and embarrassment in the family. Buddy's friend Erica wants to lose her virginity and selects Willie as her partner.

title: Hard Times
description: Buddy's interference in the relationship of two close friends backfires. Nancy experiences difficulty juggling a career and being a good parent.

title: Whispers
description: Buddy's friendship with a teacher leads to whispers at school and a valuable lesson for Buddy about good people doing bad things. Meanwhile, Annie will do anything to persuade Willie to grant her an interview for her school newspaper.

title: Play on Love
description: Willie finds himself torn between two loves after he falls for the director of his play just before announcing his engagement to Rachel. Doug objects to Buddy's plans to buy a questionable used car.

title: Daylight Serenade
description: Buddy criticizes Kate's nerdy piano student but later views him in a different light. Nancy needs Annie to teach her how to roller skate in order to impress a handsome colleague.

title: Such a Fine Line
description: A 14 year old student falls madly in love with Kate. Jeff returns to Pasadena with an unlikely career.

title: The Ties That Bind
description: Elaine resurfaces in Kate's life after being dumped by Fred for a younger woman. Meanwhile, Annie experiences abandonment issues, too.

title: Just Like Old Times
description: Buddy pretends that her college applications were rejected, but her real issue is being Willie Lawrence's little sister. Doug attempts to share his passion for baseball with Annie.

title: Smarts
description: Annie and Buddy each have problems with intellect: Annie feels she's too smart, while Buddy fears she's not smart enough.

title: Letting Go
description: With Buddy departing soon for college, Doug has difficulty letting go, while she secretly fears leaving.
